html:
1.5.24  11:33 pm   Pray tell what is that lick you play on the keys after the word "blue" in 9 8 7. Near the end but just before the ending groovy vamp

      if you want me to give you the name of the lick i can't because it is a nameless lick. it is improvised, but it's also probably fairly typical of what keyboard players play. it's what i played in the temp demo, and it is a rare exception where i kept it in the final because it had a casualness that i didn't think i could improve upon

1.5.24  10:42 pm   how are you able to answer all of these questions so perfectly?

      that's because i make so many mistakes

1.5.24  9:37 pm   what should i buy from the corner store

      how about a cashew

1.5.24  9:30 pm   What state capital do you mean in "wrecked music of the state capital? 

      maybe indiana? no i wasn't thinking of any one in particular. but you can

1.5.24  7:49 pm   seven is such a bad number of days in a week. i personally think there should be six days in a week. what do u think

      that might be fine but it's not happening

1.5.24  7:32 pm   any advice on getting started learning animation? I have a lot of experience with video, including making things clumsily move around with key frames in final cut, so maybe that means I've already gotten started? in any case, I would love to know any thoughts you have on how best to proceed. thanks :)

      i don't know the best way to proceed, but i know perhaps some of the worst

1.5.24  7:18 pm   Do you think ants would like to listen to music?

     sure, but it would be much different from the music we listen to

     Why or why not?

     their whole life is on a drastically different timescale and size scale

1.5.24  6:50 pm   What is your favorite texture?

      groovy

1.5.24  5:01 pm   how to wait for the mail to come>?

      write some mail

1.5.24  4:53 pm   Do you know the difference between a duck?

      one leg's the same

1.5.24  4:39 pm   bill, how do you feel being an artistic inspiration to people around the world?

     good

      do you want to be?

     yes

1.5.24  4:22 pm   i feel like i don't know what i'm doing in life. and other people always tell me "no one knows what they're doing in life", but i feel like i don't know what i'm doing more than most people? i feel like most people sort of understand what they're supposed to do and then go and do it. but i don't know what i'm supposed to do, so i do what i think i would be supposed to do and feel weird about it. is this how most people feel? somehow i doubt it.

      yes a lot of people feel exactly this way. i hear from a lot of them here

1.5.24  3:16 pm   what is your education?

     thinking about stuff, going places, doing things, talking to people

      you seem very smar t

1.5.24  2:08 pm   Why do you think Santa Clause, endowed with a watchful ability, delights in a formal, request asking, letter based system?

      to show off

1.5.24  2:08 pm   How often do people mistake you for bill evans

      not nearly as often as people mistake bill evans for bill evans

1.5.24  1:40 pm   How often do you grab some part of your face/head in thought while reading these questions?

      i've never done it except with this one

1.5.24  1:22 pm   what are you most fascinated by?

     lines

      what do you find yourself thinking of most often?

     lines

1.5.24  12:43 pm   When does the corner store close?

      on the opposite corner

1.5.24  12:05 pm   Did you use an electric guitar in "fly around"? If so, why don't you use it in more of your songs?

      if so, then maybe i do

1.5.24  11:51 am   hi bill. what is your favourite place on earth?

      as long as i'm still not a statue, i see no need to pick just 1 location

1.5.24  11:12 am   When working on a music video, do you tend to work on the music, or the video first? Or are they done simultaneously?

      for a music video (song video) the song is done first

1.5.24  10:57 am   At the corner of the store!
I'm crying on the floor.
Then it closes.

      fair enough

1.5.24  9:36 am   bill are you happy?

      sometimes

1.5.24  9:33 am   thoughts on humans

      pretty cool huh

1.5.24  8:39 am   is the start of the song "the ending" where it's a repeated sequence of declining notes sampled from your 6 second video posted called "daily schedule" on 26/10/15?

      no, and it's not the same notes either

1.5.24  8:24 am   do you have any tips for surviving?

      drink water

1.5.24  7:54 am   how do you deal with the boring parts of creating? (assuming there are parts you don't like)

      i don't find anything boring about it. that doesn't mean it's all good. actually nevermind i just realized it all is good

1.5.24  6:08 am   hello bill, how do you make a cake without actually making a cake? I have always wondered and you are my trusted person. 

      make a picture of a cake

1.5.24  6:07 am   whenever someone says hi to you do you have the urge to go "hello world" 

      no, but that makes sense

1.5.24  5:10 am   Opinions on The Graduate?

      it's good

1.5.24  4:16 am   what does the 0 in 2024 mean

      that's how many centuries have elapsed since the year 2000

1.5.24  3:36 am   What is the funniest thing you have seen on the internet?

      email

1.5.24  2:20 am   most times i feel fine, and sometimes my brain explodes and suddenly i feel like i can't handle anything anymore. why is the human brain like this? 

      why wouldn't it be like that

1.5.24  1:43 am   Is art meant to comfort the disturbed and disturb the comforted?

      surely both, in due time

1.5.24  1:05 am   do you ever get frustrated when other people ask questions or assume answers without even trying to find the answer themselves? 

      you mentioned 2 things. it does not bother me when people ask questions. it might bother me when people assume answers. but now that i think about it, whether i admit it or not, i think i find it satisfying to correct people's incorrect assumptions about me

1.4.24  10:53 pm   can you tell us what your ongoing resolutions from last march and may are

      from last march was to make several videos that i selected from my videos list. from may was to learn the dutch language. the videos are the most important priority, the language is more of a side hobby which may become more professional in the future

1.4.24  9:47 pm   can you play the violin

      i've never tried, but because of my technical understanding of how it works i think it's likely i'd be able to make at least something happen, if i picked one up

1.4.24  8:28 pm   Have you ever considered writing a book?

      there's a lot of other stuff i'd like to write first

1.4.24  8:19 pm   Do you like making art?

      sure

1.4.24  4:50 pm   What's your favorite fish?

      gold

1.4.24  2:00 pm   How was the lunch you went out to get?

      i don't know which you mean, because i've gotten hundreds of lunches, but it was probably good. i'm a good lunch getter, from all the experience i've had

1.4.24  12:58 pm   Do you think that given any musical idea, even insane stupid clearly wrong musical ideas (trying to do something wrong as you say, obviously up to interpretation), there is a way to follow it up somewhere? As in, is it possible to be actually stuck musically do you think?

      i'm not quite sure what you mean, but i find when you try to do something 'wrong' on purpose, it leads to good things much faster than if you had started out trying to be good

1.4.24  12:37 pm   Is hell nice? 

      in the winter yes

1.4.24  12:30 pm   Say if I wanted to pull something out of a hat, but it wasn't a rabbit, more like a cat, bit I wanted the cat to wear the hat, how would I do about doing that?

      you'd need a fat hat, and a flat cat

1.4.24  12:12 pm   what would be your ideal list of omelet ingredients

      chocolate

1.4.24  12:10 pm   do you like math

      yes

1.4.24  11:21 am   what do you think of the name thaddeus

      it's ok

1.4.24  10:30 am   How do you know you're not in a dream?

      i don't

1.4.24  10:17 am   is there some question that you want to be asked here? or some you want to be asked in general?

      i prefer to be asked questions i did not ask to be asked. that's part of the magic of having other people involved in this

1.4.24  10:01 am   Can you please start a podcast and I will be your guest

      sure
